detectors.description:
YFVRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards__1.sol#869-883) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards__1.sol#871)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards__1.sol#874)

[YFVRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVRewards__1.sol#L869-L883) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
